reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan to be of good quality, comfortable with non-itchy material, and appreciate its true purple color.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Roomy and comfy
items.body: It is a great sweater. Looks just as pictured. Color true to picture. Bulky but comfy. Enough room to slip on easily. Read more
items.author: JESSICA Cerar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My wife loved it
items.body: The Ferrtye Women's Oversized Chunky Open Front Cardigan Sweater is a delightful addition to any wardrobe. My wife absolutely adores it! The cable knit design adds a touch of elegance to the cardigan, making it perfect for both casual and more formal occasions. Its long sleeves provide extra warmth during chilly days, and the oversized fit is incredibly comfortable. The open front style is versatile and easy to layer with different outfits. What sets this cardigan apart is its quality. The material feels soft and cozy, and it's well-constructed to withstand regular wear. The attention to detail in the knitting is impressive, and it doesn't lose its shape even after multiple washes. This cardigan is a stylish choice for any woman looking to stay warm and fashionable. It has become my wife's go-to piece for the fall and winter seasons. If you're searching for a similar item, you won't be disappointed with the Ferrtye Women's Oversized Chunky Cardigan. It's a fashion statement that brings both comfort and style to your wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Sergej M.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warm and cozy
items.body: This sweater is fantastic! Warm and soft and very well made. I’ve already caught it on something and it hasn’t pulled it and ruined it. I went and got it in two more colors Read more
items.author: robert p black 3

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality, Beautiful Cardigan
items.body: This cardigan exceeded my expectations!! It’s plush and warm and exactly what I was looking for. The only thing that would make it better is if it had pockets. I did end up returning this cardigan but only because the color was too similar to one I already have. I will definitely be ordering in another color!! Read more
items.author: Katikat23

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty great sweater!
items.body: I’m not great at keeping thing short and to the point. I like learning what people really think of a product before I spend my money on it. If you are not like me, this review will basically say that I think this sweater is close to perfect, especially for the price! Now, it isn’t a super warm oversized sweater. It has a pretty lose knit-type stitch, but as a light layer to bring a pop of color and a cozy look to your outfit, its pretty perfect! Because it isn’t too thick, you get the super cute, soft and cozy look of an oversized sweater without ending up sweating through the dress or top you’re wearing under the sweater. Which then forces you into the annoying debate of whether you are going to take off the thick cozy sweater to stop the sweating, but then have to socialize with more than likely obvious arm pit and potential under boob sweat marks…or if you will just continue wearing it and sweating profusely just to hide your sweaty top. I have found that this sweater helps me avoid this frustrating, slightly embarrassing, and damp dilemma. Bonus: I also get more use out of it because I can still wear it as the weather changes. It will keep the chill off but won’t be too hot to wear over a tee shirt when fall rolls around and gets chilly in the evening; so I get to wear it sooner in the year. And after winter as the days get warmer, but it is still too cold to go out all day in just a tee shirt or tank top, it’s light weight enough that it’s easy to carry around until you need it! Unfortunately, it did snag on a bracelet and thread pulled out super easily (and on the first time I wore it too) so that made me sad. But overall I really like it and I love the sleeves! The one I got is a beautiful and bright shade of red!! I’d say worth the price. And as long as it stays together the more I wear it out and doesn’t keep getting snagged on anything and everything and ends up looking tattered with strings and loops sticking out everywhere, my review will stand! So little tip, be super vigilant of what jewlery, or purse you wear with it! …and/or letting clingy or bouncy pets with long nails on it. …end of long and detailed review! Read more
items.author: ElsaB

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Came With a Pick In It, No Pockets
items.body: It’s soft and warm. I don’t love how muted the yellow is, but it’s not too bad. What’s unfortunate is that it came with a pretty bad pick in it which has me concerned that it will get a lot more of them. There are also no buttons and no pockets, which makes it inconvenient. I wish there were pockets, at least. I usually put my phone in my sweater pocket as I walk around, but I can’t do that with this one. Read more
items.author: Jade S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, nice and warm, very comfortable
items.body: I love these sweaters and ended up buying four of them: black, blue, purple, and green. They are very good quality. They are very warm, yet don't feel heavy. The only thing I wasn't that happy with is that the color is not quite what I thought it would be for the blue and the green. The green sweater is grass green and I thought it would be more sage green. The blue was a darker blue than I thought it would be, so was the purple. I was hoping to wear them with black pants and a black turtle neck, but they are too dark for that to really work. They are pretty colors though, so I just had to rethink how I would wear them. It's so hard to assess true colors when buying online. Read more
items.author: Janine Kube

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have cardigan!!!
items.body: Definitely my go-to cardigan this season! It’s soft, oversized, and perfectly warm. I’m wearing a Medium in red. Read more
items.author: Niki Storey

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Khaki, Beige, Blue, Purple, Yellow, Black, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
